topic.title: Nothing work on fappening? http://127.0.0.1:43110/17mwfT4wY11A1GVznXoZMQEfi9TUijp7k6/
topic.body: Like the title says,  I can't visualize any images or videos

16_19sggoAZ4hcorrrfWoFWP9rwfpVsL29cnZ.body: Hi, why I can't watch anything? the watch it buttons are unclickable.

1_1CiHRyU3rHFGR1rEyTPDYH7xjN99iPZkBJ.body:
> [kaffie](#comment_182_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh): Do you have ipfs?

No I need ipfs for it ? Sorry if it's a noob question I'm new on Zeronet

Sorry but that message dissapears fast and I didn't noticed it.
But I have downloaded ipfs and did the init and ran a daemon even a test it  with this page   
> http://localhost:8080/ipfs/QmVc6zuAneKJzicnJpfrqCH9gSy6bz54JhcypfJYhGUFQu/play#/ipfs/QmTKZgRNwDNZwHtJSjCp6r5FYefzpULfy37JvMt9DwvXse ,

 which works by the way,but fappening still didn't work for me on Opera and Firefox
